explanations.machine learning: The paper mentions the use of machine learning techniques such as Markov switching models, regression trees, random forests, and neural networks to account for non-linear return predictability.
explanations.regression: The paper discusses in-sample return regressions as part of the methodology to study non-linear predictability of stock returns.
explanations.decision tree: The paper explicitly mentions regression trees as one of the model specifications used to account for non-linear return predictability.
explanations.neural network: The paper mentions neural networks as one of the model specifications used to account for non-linear return predictability.
